title: Jill's Dirty Bedtime Stories Vol. 1
description: Jill is a mysterious, highly-sexed young woman, whose decisions, never mind her motivations, often astound her partner, Matt. What parts of her past fuel her sensational, salacious sexual behaviour? Why does she so often confess to lusts for aggressive, possessive and domineering men outside of their relationship? Perhaps, in Jill's Dirty Bedtime Stories, we might begin to understand her.This is a scintillating collection of 23 erotic short stories including a final, mind-blowing novella, teasingly titled The Second Skin Body Suit.The stories delve into Jill's past, as she retells several sexual encounters to Matt. We discover ex-boyfriends, a boss, a friend of the family, strangers and her master, a man who insisted he owned - and would always own - her most private part.Topics covered include adultery, anal sex, BDSM, cuckolding, dress-up, exhibitionism, fetish, group sex, lingerie, massage, masturbation, oral sex, pornography, sex in public places, vibrator play, voyeurism & more.Story Titles include...TIED IN TIGHTSTRAIN TRYST TO DUBLINTHE GARDEN CENTRE GUY (PARTS 1-7)CAMPING TRIPAM-DRAM FROLICSCOLLEGE GIRLS IN THE NIGHTCLUBVIBRATOR VIRGINMASTER'S KINKIEST SPANKBIKINI SPUNKADULTERY IN AN 8 SERIESMILE-HIGH MAULINGJEN'S HEN NIGHTTHE TURKISH MASSAGEDARK WIG, PVC & PORNOTURKISH BONDAGELONG NIGHT EXPLORING JILL'S PHONETHE SECOND SKIN BODY SUITWord count: 103,000+ words
author: V.T. Vaughn
